KH Valor Form
G 1GG 3 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Fusion 1 (In addition to the cost of this spell, exile 1 creatures you control. When this card leaves the field, return the exiled creatures under their owner’s control.) Enchant creature. I: Valor Form gains “Enchanted creature has +2/+2”. II: Valor Form gains “Enchanted creature has double strike.” III: Enchanted creature gets reach.
KH Wisdom Form
M 1UR 3 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Fusion 1 (In addition to the cost of this spell, exile 1 creatures you control. When this card leaves the field, return the exiled creatures under their owner’s control.) Enchant creature. I: Wisdom Form gains “Enchanted creature has reach, triple strike, and -2/+0”. II: Wisdom Form gains “Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it.” III: Enchanted creature gets flanking.
KH Limit Form
W 2WW 4 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Enchant creature. Whenever an action-ability deals damage, gain that much life. I, II, III: Choose a card name that hasn’t been chosen from among Sonic Blade, Ragnarok, Strike Raid, Ars Arcanum. Create a copy of the card with the chosen name. You may cast that copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, target enchanted creature with it.
KH Master Form
M 2W/U/B/R/GW/U/B/R/G 4 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Fusion 2 (In addition to the cost of this spell, exile 2 creatures you control. When this card leaves the field, return the exiled creatures under their owner’s control.) Enchant creature. I: Master Form gains “Enchanted creature has vigilance.” II: Master Form gains “Enchanted creature has prowess.” III: Put three +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
KH Final Form
W 3WW 5 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Fusion 2 (In addition to the cost of this spell, exile 2 creatures you control. When this card leaves the field, return the exiled creatures under their owner’s control.) Enchant creature. I: Final Form gains “Enchanted creature has indestructible.” II: Final Form gains “Enchanted creature has +X/+X where X is the number of Enchantment - Saga Aura in your graveyard.” III: Enchanted creature gets flying.
KH Anti Form
B 1BBB 4 Enchantment - Saga Aura Enchantment
1 Fusion 2 (In addition to the cost of this spell, exile 2 creatures you control. When this card leaves the field, return the exiled creatures under their owner’s control.) Enchant creature. I: Exile an Enchantment-Saga Aura from hand or graveyard, destroy all creatures opponents control with mana value 2 or less. II, III: Enchanted creature has +X/+X where X is your devotion to black. (Each B in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
KH Books of profecy
WU WU 2 Legendary Enchantment - Saga Enchantment
1 (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I: Put a card from your graveyard to your library. II: Scry 1 then draw a card. III: Put a card from your graveyard to the battlefield, exile it at end of turn.
KH Foresight
3 3 Enchantment Enchantment
1 During your upkeep choose one — • Create a token that’s a copy of target permanent in your graveyard, except it loses its abilities and types. Pay life equal to its mana value. • Sacrifice a creature, gain life equal to its mana value. • Proliferate.
KH Unleash the Darkness
B 2BB 4 Enchantment - Aura Enchantment
1 Enchant creature Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 for each age counter on Unleash the Darkness.
KH Character Selection
3 3 Enchantment Enchantment
1 Creatures in your hand have cycling {2}. ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
KH Save Point
2 2 Enchantment Enchantment
1 {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Regenerate target creature. {7}, {T}: Note your life total. {3}, sacrifice Save Point, {T}: Your life total become equal the noted life total.
KH Heart Release
3 3 Enchantment Enchantment
1 Whenever a non-Artifact, non-Heartless and non-Nobody creature is destroyed, create an Heart token with cost equal to that creature’s mana value.
KH My Friends are my Power
W 3W 4 Enchantment Enchantment
1 If you control two or more creatures you can’t lose the game and your opponents can’t win the game.
KH Boss Rush
B 3BB 5 Enchantment Enchantment
1 Whenever a creature with boss enters the battlefield, you may discard a card, then draw a card. When a creature with boss leaves the battlefield, you may pay 5 life, then search a creature with boss from your library, reveal it then put it in your hand.
